Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselTweaks
Description:
Included Tweaks:

- Auto Sort Armoury Chest
- Character Class Switcher
- Commands
- Custom Chat Timestamp
- DTR
- Expert Deliveries
- Forced Cutscene Music
- Hide MSQ Complete
- Keep Instant Portrait
- Keep Screen Awake
- Minimap Adjustments
- Refresh Material List
- Reveal Duty Requirements
- Scrollable Tabs
- Search the markets
- Series Exp Bar
Changelog:
New Tweak: Series Exp Bar

The experience bar shows series rank and experience instead. A little * after the rank indicates a claimable reward.

> Note
> In order for this tweak to work properly, please make sure to disable "Show Experience Percentage" in Simple Tweaks first.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: LeveHelper
Description: A little helper to check which Levequests have been completed and which are missing.
Changelog:
- Added: Wanted Target and Treasure Coffer notifications!
  - Simply click on the name in the chat notification to open up the map with a flag set to its location.
- Added: A proper changelog!
- Added: The Dalamud Plugin Installer now has a button to visit the plugins GitHub repository.
- Added: The repository now has a sponsor link to my [Ko-Fi](https://ko-fi.com/haselnussbomber) page.
- Fixed: Levemete names are now properly formatted by the games name formatter. Not sure if this was needed, but I did it anyway.^^

Please report if you found something is not working or if you discover a wanted target, that the plugin didn't notify you for. Thank you!
